t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    s1 = input()
    s2 = input()
    cnt = 0
    flag = False
    for i in reversed(range(n)):
        if s1[i] < s2[i]:
            flag = True
            cnt += 1
        elif s1[i] > s2[i]:
            flag = False
        elif flag:
            cnt += 1
    print(cnt)
    t -= 1

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    k = int(input())
    st1 = input()
    st2 = input()
    x = 0
    y = 0
    z = 0
    l = []
    for i in range(k):
        if st1[i] == st2[i]:
            x += 1
        elif st1[i] < st2[i]:
            y += 1
            z += x
            x = 0
        else:
            x = 0
    print(z + y)

import sys, io, os
for test in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    b = input()
    ans = 0
    t = 0
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        if a[i] < b[i]:
            ans += 1
            t = 1
        elif a[i] > b[i]:
            t = 0
        elif t:
            ans += 1
            continue
    print(ans)

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline
num_test_cases = int(input())
for _ in range(num_test_cases):
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    b = input()
    ans = 0
    who_was_bigger_before = None
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        letter_a = a[i]
        letter_b = b[i]
        if letter_a < letter_b:
            ans += 1
            who_was_bigger_before = 'b'
        elif letter_a == letter_b:
            if who_was_bigger_before == 'b':
                ans += 1
        else:
            who_was_bigger_before = 'a'
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t -= 1
    n = int(input())
    a = list((i for i in input()))
    b = list((i for i in input()))
    c = 0
    prev = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if a[n - 1 - i] < b[n - 1 - i]:
            c += 1
            prev = 1
        elif a[n - 1 - i] > b[n - i - 1]:
            prev = -1
        elif prev == 1:
            c += 1
    print(c)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    A = input()
    B = input()
    ans = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        j = i
        over = False
        while j < n:
            if A[j] < B[j]:
                ans += j - i + 1
                i = j
                break
            elif A[j] > B[j]:
                i = j
                break
            if j == n - 1:
                over = True
            j += 1
        if over:
            break
        i += 1
    print(ans)

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    A = [x for x in input()]
    B = [x for x in input()]
    ans = 0
    temp = 0
    for i in range(n):
        a = A[n - i - 1]
        b = B[n - i - 1]
        if a < b:
            ans += 1
            temp = 1
        elif a == b and temp == 1:
            ans += 1
            temp = 1
        else:
            temp = 0
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    str1 = input()
    str2 = input()
    ans = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    while j < n:
        if str1[j] == str2[j]:
            j += 1
        elif str1[j] < str2[j]:
            ans += j - i + 1
            j += 1
            i = j
        else:
            j += 1
            i = j
    print(ans)

ans = ''
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    t = input()
    count = 0
    is_s_small = -1
    for i in range(len(s) - 1, -1, -1):
        if s[i] < t[i]:
            count += 1
            is_s_small = 1
        elif s[i] > t[i]:
            is_s_small = 0
        elif is_s_small == 1:
            count += 1
    ans += str(count) + '\n'
print(ans)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    q = input()
    c = 0
    w = 0
    i = n - 1
    while i >= 0:
        if s[i] < q[i]:
            w = 1
            c = c + 1
        elif s[i] == q[i] and w == 1:
            c = c + 1
        elif w == 1 and s[i] > q[i]:
            w = 0
        i = i - 1
    print(c)

n = int(input())
for i in range(1, n + 1):
    c = int(input())
    s1 = input()
    s2 = input()
    e = 0
    count = 0
    ans = 0
    l = []
    for i in range(c):
        if s1[i] == s2[i]:
            e = e + 1
        elif s1[i] < s2[i]:
            count += 1
            ans += e
            e = 0
        else:
            e = 0
    print(ans + count)
